# Addact Technologies
> Offer AI-driven CMS development, migration, upgrade, and support services tailored to business needs.  
> Addact Technologies is a trusted digital partner provides service in enterprise CMS development and AI-backed digital transformation. We help global enterprises and agencies with strategy, implementation, integration, upgrades, and managed services across platforms like Sitecore, Umbraco, Kentico, Strapi, and Contentstack.

[Addact Technologies](https://addact.net/): Your partner for AI-driven CMS development, and scalable digital transformation.

Last Updated: Wed, 03 Sep 2025 12:15:00 GMT

## Services
- [Sitecore CMS Development](https://addact.net/sitecore-cms-development): AI-powered Sitecore CMS development, consulting, integration, support, and upgrades.
- [Hire Umbraco Developer](https://www.addact.net/umbraco-cms-development/hire-umbraco-developer): Geared for high-performance digital platforms—custom web, uSkinned themes, headless architecture, Umbraco upgrades, cloud hosting, and integrations. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
- [Hire Kentico Developer](https://www.addact.net/kentico-cms-development/hire-kentico-developer): Secure, scalable Kentico CMS development, performance optimization, managed services, migrations, maintenance, and integrations. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
- [Hire Strapi Developer](https://www.addact.net/strapi-cms-development/hire-strapi-developer): Flexible, API-driven Strapi solutions—custom dev, plugin creation, API integration, migration, support, maintenance, and performance optimization. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
- [Contentful Development Services](https://www.addact.net/contentful-cms-development): API-first Contentful solutions—development, migration, managed services, upgrades, support, and CMS integrations. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}
- [Hire Sitecore Developers](https://addact.net/sitecore-cms-development/hire-sitecore-developer)
- [Strapi CMS Development Services](https://addact.net/strapi-development-services)
- [Contentstack Development Services](https://addact.net/contentstack-development)
- [Umbraco Development Services](https://addact.net/umbraco-development): Build scalable, flexible digital solutions with Umbraco CMS consulting, development, and support.
- [Kentico Development Services](https://addact.net/kentico-development): Enterprise-level Kentico development, migration, and optimization for high-performing websites.
- [Strapi Development Services](https://addact.net/strapi-development): Headless CMS expertise with Strapi development, customization, and migration services.
- [Contentstack Development](https://addact.net/contentstack-development): Build modern digital experiences with Contentstack headless CMS services.

- Enterprise-grade Integration & Migration
